## HTMLDimensionsImplementation type

The script will check for different APIs in order to implement the notification of HTML dimensions changes. By order of preference: [ ResizeObserver](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/ResizeObserver) (resize), [ MutationObserver](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MutationObserver) (mutation) and polling.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type HTMLDimensionsImplementation = 'resize' | 'mutation' | 'polling';
```
